team_0060_nelke_02:
As I’ve told you, the name’s Clive. Please don’t
forget it.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_03:
Glad to see you’ve got my name committed to
memory![VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_04:
Now, let’s pick up our conversation from where
we left off before.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_05:
As I mentioned, I joined Operation Starfall to
resolve a sticky situation and to find out the\r
reasons behind Team Star’s odd behavior.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_06:
Above all, I want to know why the students in
Team Star have stopped coming to school.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_07:
And, just like Cassiopeia, I want the team to
disband for good.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_08:
Since joining Operation Starfall with you, I’ve
already had some success in opening up a\r
dialogue with Team Star.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_09:
And I think I’m starting to understand things
more clearly.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_10: But I don’t have enough information just yet.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_11:
That’s why I want to speak with students from
Team Star’s other squads as well.[VAR 0114(001E)]
team_0060_nelke_12:
[VAR BD06(0000)]If you intend to take on another base, know that
you can count on me for backup.\c
Till then, see you around,
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(001E)]
